taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Eragrostis pilosa var. perplexa (L.H. Harv.) S.D. Koch

bio:treatment.description: Culms with numerous glandular pits. Sheaths with glandular pits; blades with glandular pits. Spikelets 0.6-1.4 mm wide. Upper glumes 1-1.4 mm; lemmas 1.8-2 mm. Caryopses 0.8-1 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Eragrostis pilosa var. perplexa is known from widely scattered locations in Wyoming, North Dakota, Nebraska, Colorado, and northwestern Texas.
